title: FS T206 Eddie Collins Formerly PSA 2 crease free SOLD
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS T206 Eddie Collins Formerly PSA 2 crease free SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I have an extra Eddie Collins to sell today.  It was formerly a PSA 2 that I cracked out for the raw stack, flip included.  The card is crease free, but has the the little dark spot above his hair tha matches up to a light scratch on back.  I am not sure if it was a baccer stem or what.

    SOLD TO TIM, Thanks

Thanks,
Bob

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/FOR%20SALE/?action=view&current=T206collinssalefront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/FOR%20SALE/T206collinssalefront.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/FOR%20SALE/?action=view&current=T206collinssaleback.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/FOR%20SALE/T206collinssaleback.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

It is yours Tim.  info sent and will ship on Monday.  Stay tuned, more to come.

Bob
